Package org.aerogear.android.authentication

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AddAuthBuilder<T extends AuthenticationModule>  
    AuthenticationModule
    A module which can authenticate a user.
    Authenticator
    This is a factory and manager for AuthenticationModule It allows you to add and remove authentication modules.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuthType
    A enum for the types of AuthenticationModule Authenticator knows how to build.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AuthValue
    Use this Annotation to mark in a AuthenticationModule a value to send to the server.
